post.description:
Scan and save OSR details to inventories_in_osr table

This endpoint accepts an array of scan detail items and saves them to the inventories_in_osr table.
Each item should contain:
- products_in_osr_id: ID of the inventory in OSR
- inventory_identifier: Inventory identifier code
- serial_pallet: Serial/pallet number
- quantity_dispatched: Quantity being dispatched
- scan_time: Time of scan
- scan_by: User who performed the scan
